attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: gordon brown to retire from government and relinquish his pension for the mess he has got the country into. he needs to take responsibility for the recession he took the country into as both treasurer and prime minister. we did not elect him and did not want him to run the country he should leave now before the mess is irreversible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
